product.name: ColorBird Boho Curtains Bohemian 84 inch Length 2 Panels Set, Western Blue Embroidered Curtain Drapes for Bedroom Living Room Closet
product.description:
Window treatment
Add some different and warm for home
A fashion furniture brand that specializes in making household life warmer and more comfortable.
Crafted of premium quality and lightweight cotton blend.
Allows light and air to get through without sacrificing privacy.
Features a Rod Pocket construction for easy hanging.
Not as blackout curains also a boho decor
product.bullet_points:
• Size & Header Type - 2 panels per package, each blue linen curtain measures 52"wide x 84”length (132 x 213 cm). Linen room darkening curtains have a sewn-in pocket that slides easily onto your curtain rod for quick installation
• High Quality Material - Coastal curtains are made of linen blend materials, highly absorbent and breathable, passing air to the room and ensuring its circulation. Keep you feel comfortable and cool in hot weather
• Privacy & Relax - Mid century modern curtains offer up a semi opacity design so you can let the sunlight stream in or leave a low glow and provide privacy by blocking the view into the room from outside
• Enhance Your Home - Features a blue embroidered geometric pattern that's complemented by broad borders on two sides for attractive bohemian style. Blue curtains perfect for boys bedroom, living room, dining room, office, doorways and etc
• Easy Care - Blue patterned curtains are machine washable with a mesh bag with a gentle detergent (no bleach), delicate cycle; Do Not Wring; Tumble dry low; Use iron on low heat to straighten and remove creases from packaging
